title: AMD Ryzen 7000 Gaming PC Build! You're not ready!
description: New Customers Exclusive  Get $25 off your purchase of any AMD and Intel Processor (limit one per customer):  Check out Micro Centers PC Builder:  Submit to Micro Centers Build Showcase:   Shop - AMD Ryzen 7 7700X  Shop - Gigabyte X670 AORUS ELITE AX AMD AM5 ATX Motherboard Shop - EVGA NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 -  Shop - Inland Prime 500GB SSD  Shop - Crucial 16GB (2 x 8GB) DDR5-4800  Shop - PowerSpec 750 Watt  Shop - Montech X1 Tempered Glass ATX Mid-Tower Computer Case  Shop - Noctua NH-U14S CPU Cooler   Shoutout to Jim from @DeckReady and @PSReady for giving me a hand!  Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:   Chapter Titles: 0:00 Who Needs an RTX 4090? 1:41 Mr Deck Ready AKA Jimmy Champane 2:16 The PC Parts Hunt 6:36 Did We Make a Mistake? Probably. 8:39 AMD Ryzen 7000 + AM5 Motherboard 10:20 This Isn't Going to Work 13:10 No Turning Back 14:29 The PC Build Lives
